goal.en: Cultivating Programming and Application Skills: Ability to implement programs to meet research or work needs. Cultivating System Integration Skills: Select and integrate necessary technologies and modules based on system requirements to complete system tasks. Cultivating Programming and Application Skills: Ability to implement programs to meet research or work needs. Cultivating System Integration Skills: Select and integrate necessary technologies and modules based on system requirements to complete system tasks. 1. Teaching students how to think about a task digitally and write it out in software. 2. Teaching students to use third-party modules. There are many free and open-source solutions available online that may offer usable solutions, but mechanical engineering students have never been exposed to them. This course will arrange some third-party modules, teaching students how to download and use them from the internet, enabling them to utilize online resources. 3. The programming language used in this course is Python, and it will incorporate applications and development of machine learning.
goal.ch: 培養程式設計與應用能力：能夠實作程式滿足研究或工作上的需求。 培養系統整合能力：根據系統需求挑選及整合必要的技術與模組，完成系統任務。 培養程式設計與應用能力：能夠實作程式滿足研究或工作上的需求。 培養系統整合能力：根據系統需求挑選及整合必要的技術與模組，完成系統任務。1.教學生如何將一個工作以數位的方式進行思考，並且用軟體寫出來。2.教學生使用第三方模組。網路上有很多免費且開放原始碼的解決方式，它們可能提供一些可用的解決方案，只是機械系的學生們從未接觸。本課程會安排一些第三方模組，教學生如何從網路上下載與使用，讓學生具備應用網路資源的能力。 3.本課程使用的程式語言是Python，並會帶入機器學習的應用與開發

content.en:
The course content is as follows:
Part 1: Python Development Environment and Basic Syntax
Fundamental Python Programming
Introduction to Python Containers
Introduction to Python Debugging
Part 2: Python and Data Processing
Python Windows Programming
Numpy
Pandas
Comprehensive Practice
Part 3: Python and Visualization
Matplotlib
Seaborn
Comprehensive Practice
Part 4: Python and Machine Learning
Keras
Tensorflow
CNN
Part 5: Python and Applications
Natural Language Processing
Autoencoder
GAN
Note!!
This course assumes that students already have basic skills in control structures (if, for, while, etc.), subroutines, and are not specifically detailed in the course.
Do not enroll in this course without having taken a basic Python course.
